overall.internal_reasoning:

- ISSUE2 (clarity_precision): Stem: “Which option shows the BEST way to divide the word ‘unbreakable’ so you can decode each part?” Ambiguous between syllable division vs. morphemic division. Under a morphemic interpretation, A (un / break / able) could be seen as best; under syllabication, B (un / break / a / ble) is best. This could lead to different answers.
